title: Lotus Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Buffet, Asian, Catering, Nyonya Malaysian, Kosher
description: Formerly known as Sri Melaka Vegetarian Nyonya. Veggie food buffet and a la carte menu. Offers numerous choices such as satay, curries, sizzling beancurd, Nyonya eggplant, and mockmeats (made from soy and wheat gluten). The attached health food store sells a range of vegetarian cooking products and meat-analogues.
